Customers will enjoy One-Day Delivery on millions of products, and can browse products with clear, local pricing and without additional customs charges. t: Amazon lands in Ireland with Amazon.ie
s: March 24, 2025 - Amazon Ireland joins the list of international marketplaces for the brand, following in the footsteps of South Africa (2024) and Belgium (2022).

s: March 19, 2025 - Amazon has launched Amazon.ie, its dedicated website for Prime members living in Ireland.
